title: Kim Sung-hwan, Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, Republic of Korea: Interview - The Middle East - Oxford Business Group

quotes: Having established diplomatic relations in 1980, in 2009 South Korea and the UAE upgraded our relations to a strategic partnership
Having established diplomatic relations in 1980, in 2009 South Korea and the UAE upgraded our relations to a strategic partnership
In 2011, bilateral trade volume totalled $22bn, making the UAE our 11th-largest trading partner.
bilateral investment has more than doubled from $116m in 2010 to $286m in 2011, strengthening the UAE’s position as South Korea’s most valuable investment partner in the Gulf region.

quotes: South Korean hospitals have treated many patients from the UAE, and we are now working to provide the same health care services in the UAE.
